title: Digital Fury Team
body:
Hello, Digital furry is currently looking for players from the range of Silver to Diamond players  to join our team, we plan on playing weekly 5v5 tournaments and are in need of some dedicated players to join.

Requirements

-16+ years old.
-Some type of mic  voice device.

Any questions feel free to  add me in game -Shouri
{{sticker:vlad-salute}}    Our discord: https://discord.gg/vjACSF                      Edit: also looking for a plat+ Support main

replies.body: Hey, I'm a Top/Jung player currently plat 4. If still searching for members I'd like to join
Yes we're still in need for someone to join our main roster as a top laner, did you join our discord?

Hey mate, I've added you in game - 24 year old gold jungler. I've played the game on and off since season 1 but have always followed the pro scene. Just decided to get back into the actual game this pre-season and am looking to climb but prefer 5 man premade over solo due to my knowledge being based on pro-scene rather than solo-que which is a different world lol. Good team comp drafter and shotcaller but can fill roles that are needed (Jungle is easiest shotcalling roll for early game tho).

Edit: Have a mic

hey, i am a returning player league player with previous competitive/team experience. i play main top and second jg, i am 20 and how a working mic using discord primarily. id be down to try out for you team if you still need a top laner!

IGN - kikobay

Hello, I’m a top main currently in D4. Am 18, have a mic, and would like to join the main team if there isn’t a current top laner

Thanks
Sure, add me in game and we can talk about it -shouri
Top/ Jungle main currently d3 peaked rank 46 have prior team experience. Would like to join if there's still a spot.

Hey I'm a d4 adc player that only recently switched over from dota (dead game with lazy devs), I played league on and off for years but never really played ranked before this year. I have amateur tourney experience in dota and am comfortable being a late game shot caller. If you still need a player feel free to add me :D
You're feel to join our discord https://discord.gg/HrJzh7 and met the team, and maybe be a fill or sub for adc but we really need a top/jungler at the moment. also feel free to add me in game.
